Report: Rockets trade Westbrook to Wizards for Wall

The Rockets have agreed to trade Russell Westbrook to the Wizards in exchange for John Wall and a first-round pick, according to multiple reports. Westbrook averaged 27.2 points, 7.9 boards, and seven assists during his lone season in Houston, while Wall hasn't appeared in an NBA contest since December 2018.
